subject: Career
title: The Informational Interview
description: A quick win: understand The Informational Interview.

hook.text: You think you want to be a data scientist. But you've never talked to one about what the job is actually like.

buildup.text: Informational interviews let you explore a field without committing. Ask questions, don't pitch yourself.

discovery.text: People love talking about their work. A genuine 'Can I learn about your role?' gets a 70%+ response rate.

twist.text: The hidden benefit: 40% of informational interviews lead to job opportunities later.

climax.text: Prepare five specific questions. Ask about daily reality, not just highlights. Listen more than talk.

punchline.text: Don't guess what a career is like. Ask someone living it.

quiz.question: What hidden benefit do informational interviews often provide?
options: About 40% lead to job opportunities later
